doc.author: liangwei
doc.description: 网络维护基础数据月报

sql.name: networkmaintenance_basedatamonthly_reportpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: networkmaintenance_basedatamonthly_report.group
networkmaintenance_basedatamonthly_report.rowtitle
sql.item: select distinct trim('传输电路总数（折合2M）')||'.'||trim('一干') from dual union all select distinct trim('传输电路总数（折合2M）')||'.'||trim('二干') from dual union all select distinct trim('传输电路总数（折合2M）')||'.'||trim('城域核心') from dual union all select distinct trim('传输电路总数（折合2M）')||'.'||trim('城域接入') from dual union all select distinct trim('自建电路总数(折合2M)')||'.'||trim('一干') from dual union all select distinct trim('自建电路总数(折合2M)')||'.'||trim('二干') from dual union all select distinct trim('自建电路总数(折合2M)')||'.'||trim('城域核心') from dual union all select distinct trim('自建电路总数(折合2M)')||'.'||trim('城域接入') from dual union all select distinct trim('光缆线路总量（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('一干') from dual union all select distinct trim('光缆线路总量（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('二干') from dual union all select distinct trim('光缆线路总量（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('城域核心') from dual union all select distinct trim('光缆线路总量（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('城域接入') from dual union all select distinct trim('自建光缆线路（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('一干') from dual union all select distinct trim('自建光缆线路（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('二干') from dual union all select distinct trim('自建光缆线路（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('城域核心') from dual union all select distinct trim('自建光缆线路（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('城域接入') from dual union all select distinct trim('网管系统（套）')||'.'||trim('网络级网管') from dual union all select distinct trim('网管系统（套）')||'.'||trim('网元级网管') from dual union all select distinct trim('网管系统（套）')||'.'||trim('本地维护终端（LCT）') from dual union all select distinct trim('传输维护人员数量（名）')||'.'||trim('传输维护人员数量（名）') from dual union all select distinct trim('传输电路总数') from dual union all select distinct trim('自建电路总数') from dual union all select distinct trim('光缆线路总量') from dual union all select distinct trim('自建光缆线路') from dual union all select distinct trim('网管系统') from dual

sql.name: networkmaintenance_basedatamonthly_report.centervalue
sql.item: select distinct trim('传输电路总数（折合2M）')||'.'||trim('一干'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000005),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('传输电路总数（折合2M）')||'.'||trim('二干'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000007),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('传输电路总数（折合2M）')||'.'||trim('城域核心'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000009),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('传输电路总数（折合2M）')||'.'||trim('城域接入'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000011),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('自建电路总数(折合2M)')||'.'||trim('一干'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000017),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('自建电路总数(折合2M)')||'.'||trim('二干'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000019),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('自建电路总数(折合2M)')||'.'||trim('城域核心'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000021),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('自建电路总数(折合2M)')||'.'||trim('城域接入'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000024),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('光缆线路总量（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('一干'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000033),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('光缆线路总量（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('二干'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000035),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('光缆线路总量（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('城域核心'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000038),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('光缆线路总量（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('城域接入'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000036),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('自建光缆线路（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('一干'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000042),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('自建光缆线路（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('二干'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000044),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('自建光缆线路（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('城域核心'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000046),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('自建光缆线路（皮长公里）')||'.'||trim('城域接入'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000048),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('网管系统（套）')||'.'||trim('网络级网管'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000054),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('网管系统（套）')||'.'||trim('网元级网管'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000056),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('网管系统（套）')||'.'||trim('本地维护终端（LCT）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000050),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('传输维护人员数量（名）')||'.'||trim('传输维护人员数量（名）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000052),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
